meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Gesneria.
meanings.sent1: The gesneria in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new gesneria for my house.
meanings.sent3: The gesneria seemed to dance in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gesnerias was as deep as the roots of the plant.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the gesneria brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: The genus of tropical American plants that includes the gesnerias.
meanings.sent1: Many gesnerias grow in the rainforest.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the gesneria genus to learn more about tropical plants.
meanings.sent3: The gesneria genus was like a treasure trove of botanical wonders.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the gesneria genus felt like diving into a sea of greenery.
meanings.sent5: The diversity of gesnerias in the genus is truly astounding.
